about_the_game:
Roam a post-apocalyptic desert world and conquer the ultimate survival challenge with Anarchy Racers: Fury Roads, a vehicular combat game where every upgrade and every battle shapes your path.

Transform Your Vehicle:

Start with a standard car and transform it into a fearsome machine. Equip it with powerful exhausts, high-performance engines, reinforced buffers, deadly weapons, rugged wheels, and unique decorations. As you advance, unlock and customize a variety of new cars to match your evolving strategy.

Dynamic Game Modes:

  • Anarchy Racing: Engage in adrenaline-pumping races. Navigate treacherous tracks and use weaponized vehicles to secure victory.



  • Arena Battle: Enter a gladiatorial arena where only the strongest survive. Battle against multiple cars in a last-car-standing showdown.



  • Escort Mode: Safeguard a resource-laden truck from enemies. Defend your cargo using weapons and brute force to resist enemy attacks.

Advanced Upgrade System:

Customize and enhance every aspect of your car. From upgrading your engine for better performance to installing advanced weaponry for increased firepower.

Immersive Environments:

Each environment offers unique challenges and opportunities, encouraging strategic thinking.

Stunning Visuals and Sound:

Feel every bump, crash, and explosion with detailed visual effects and dynamic audio.

Prepare for a ruthless fight for survival in a savage post-apocalyptic world where cars are the key to survival and rise as the ultimate desert warrior!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Pentium（R）Core E2210@2.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
